text:
yAnyEqvaina#M BUqtAni# vraqtamu#paqyanta#-manUpaqyantiq tairEqva saqhAva#BRuqthamavai#tiq viShNu#muKAq vai dEqvAH CandO#BiriqmAn ~MlOqkA-na#napajaqyyamaqBya#jayaqnaq. yadvi#ShNukraqmAn krama#tEq viShNu#rEqva BUqtvA yaja#mAnaqH CandO#BiriqmAn- ~MlOqkA-na#napajaqyyamaqBi ja#yatiq viShNOqH kramO$&syaBimAtiqhEtyA#ha gAyaqtrI vai pRu#thiqvI traiShTu#Bamaqntari#kShaqM jAga#tIqdyaurAnu#ShTuBIqrdiSaqH CandO#BirEqvEmAn-~MlOqkAn ya#thApUqrvamaqBi ja#yati || 24
(yaja#mAnEqnEti#-caiq tada#-vaBRuqthO-diSa#H-saqpta ca#) (A5)
